en.modal_enter_name: Please enter a name or ID.
en.tips_subtitle: Select an animal for detailed care information.
en.reminders_status_denied: Notifications denied. Please enable in browser settings.
en.schedules_general_subtitle: General vaccination and deworming guidelines. Always consult a local vet.
en.amr_quote: “When medicines stop working — we all lose.”
en.amr_intro: Antimicrobial Resistance (AMR) means the drugs used to treat infections — like antibiotics — no longer work effectively. In Kenya and across Africa, this is a serious threat to both animal and human life. When antibiotics are overused or misused, the germs adapt and learn to survive.
en.amr_farm_how_list:
• Giving antibiotics to animals that don’t need them “just to prevent disease.”
  • Buying drugs from agro-vet shops without prescription or lab tests.
  • Using half doses or stopping midway when the animal looks better.
  • Using human drugs like amoxicillin, metronidazole, or ampicillin on animals.
  • Ignoring withdrawal periods before selling milk or meat.
en.amr_farm_signs_list:
• Repeated mastitis in cows that doesn’t respond to treatment.
  • Pneumonia or diarrhea cases in goats that keep recurring.
  • Pigs and chickens dying even after changing several antibiotics.
en.amr_farm_what_to_do_list:
• Call a vet to examine the animal before treatment.
  • Use only prescribed veterinary antibiotics.
  • Record every treatment (drug name, animal, dosage, and date).
  • Maintain hygiene, deworm regularly, and vaccinate — prevention first.
  • Respect withdrawal periods to keep food products safe.
en.amr_pets_mistakes_list:
• Sharing leftover human drugs with pets.
  • Reusing old vet prescriptions for new illnesses.
  • Treating minor skin issues with antibiotics instead of bathing and cleaning.
en.amr_pets_practices_list:
• Groom regularly using local shampoos such as Bioline Herbal, Medivet Pet Shampoo, or PetnVet Clean & Fresh.
  • Always seek a vet’s opinion before giving any medicine.
  • Keep vaccination and deworming up to date.
en.amr_one_health_p1: The One Health Approach recognizes that human, animal, and environmental health are one and the same. When farmers misuse antibiotics, residues leak into soil and water. The same bacteria can reach humans through milk, meat, or eggs, water, or farm waste.
en.amr_one_health_p2: In the end, the resistant germs that started in livestock can infect people, and the medicines we depend on stop working for everyone. That’s why veterinarians, doctors, environmental officers, and farmers must work together.
en.amr_vaxiliv_message_content: “Healthy animals, healthy people, healthy planet — that’s One Health.”
about_content: Vaxiliv was born from a simple but urgent truth — that access to animal vaccination and livestock health services shouldn’t depend on where you live.

We built this platform to bridge the gap between rural livestock keepers and the veterinary support they deserve. As someone who has walked the dusty paths of Kenya’s northern counties, I’ve seen how disease can wipe out entire herds — not for lack of care, but for lack of access. Vaxiliv stands as a response to that reality. It’s more than just a digital space; it’s a movement towards smarter, more connected livestock health.
Our vision is to make vaccination tracking, reporting, and awareness seamless — using technology that’s simple enough for every farmer, yet powerful enough for veterinary professionals.
Every line of code here is guided by compassion, science, and a belief that innovation can protect livelihoods.
Because when we protect animals, we protect families, food systems, and futures.
Vaxiliv is not a company; it’s a calling.
It’s our contribution to a future where no farmer is left behind, and every animal’s life counts.

cow.title: Cattle Care & Health
cow.feeding_management: Healthy cattle start with proper feeding. A 400 kg cow needs 12 kg of dry matter daily. Mix Napier grass, lucerne, desmodium, and dairy meal. Provide 40–60 L of clean water and a mineral lick. Keep housing clean and spray weekly for ticks.

diseases.name: East Coast Fever
diseases.signs: High fever, swollen lymph nodes, laboured breathing, watery eyes, loss of appetite.
diseases.first_aid: Move to shade, offer clean water, and call a vet urgently for Butalex.

diseases.name: Foot and Mouth Disease
diseases.signs: Drooling, blisters in mouth, teats, and feet, refusal to walk.
diseases.first_aid: Isolate, disinfect feed areas, offer soft feeds.

diseases.name: Anaplasmosis
diseases.signs: Sudden weakness, yellowing of eyes, fever, dark-brown urine.
diseases.first_aid: Keep animal calm, shade it, offer water. Contact a vet immediately.

sheep_goat.title: Sheep & Goats Care
sheep_goat.feeding_management: Goats browse shrubs like Leucaena; sheep prefer Boma Rhodes grass. Add maize bran or cottonseed cake for growth. Provide salt licks and clean water. Sheds should be dry and raised. Deworm every 2–3 months.

diseases.name: Peste des Petits Ruminants (PPR)
diseases.signs: High fever, nasal discharge, sores in mouth, coughing, diarrhea.
diseases.first_aid: Isolate, give oral rehydration, soft feed, keep warm.

diseases.name: Contagious Caprine Pleuropneumonia (CCPP)
diseases.signs: Coughing, difficulty breathing, nasal discharge.
diseases.first_aid: Shade and calm the goat. Vet treatment: tylosin.

diseases.name: Worm Infestation
diseases.signs: Weight loss, rough coat, pale gums, bottle jaw.
diseases.first_aid: Deworm every 2–3 months with Alfabas, Levacide, etc.

pig.title: Pig Care & Health
pig.feeding_management: Feed pigs 5–7% of body weight daily: maize bran + fish meal + soya meal. Provide 10–15 L of clean water. Keep pens dry, warm, and disinfect weekly. Deworm quarterly.

diseases.name: African Swine Fever (ASF)
diseases.signs: Sudden death, high fever, red ears, vomiting, bloody diarrhea.
diseases.first_aid: No cure — immediately isolate and call veterinary authorities.

diseases.name: Worm Infestation
diseases.signs: Poor growth, rough skin, pot belly, diarrhea.
diseases.first_aid: Deworm with Albendazole or Levamisole.

dog.title: Dog Care & Health
dog.feeding_management: Feed twice daily: cooked rice, ugali, or dog meal with meat and vegetables. Provide fresh water daily. Bathe twice monthly, brush coat weekly, and deworm every 3 months.

diseases.name: Tick Fever
diseases.signs: Persistent fever, loss of appetite, pale gums, nose bleeds.
diseases.first_aid: Keep hydrated, cool, and calm.
diseases.prevention: Vet will prescribe doxycycline. Use tick baths and collars.

diseases.name: Parvovirus
diseases.signs: Severe vomiting, foul-smelling bloody diarrhea, dehydration.
diseases.first_aid: Keep warm, give oral rehydration, see a vet urgently.

diseases.name: Rabies
diseases.signs: Sudden behavior change, drooling, aggression, paralysis.
diseases.first_aid: Do not touch — isolate and alert a vet.

cat.title: Cat Care & Health
cat.feeding_management: Feed cats twice daily with fish or meat mixed with ugali or rice. Provide clean drinking water. Brush coat weekly and keep litter box clean.

diseases.name: Cat Flu
diseases.signs: Sneezing, runny nose, watery eyes, loss of appetite.
diseases.first_aid: Wipe nose & eyes with saline, give soft food, keep warm.

diseases.name: Feline Panleukopenia
diseases.signs: Vomiting, bloody diarrhea, high fever, dehydration, sudden death.
diseases.first_aid: Keep warm, provide fluids, seek urgent vet help.

diseases.name: Feline Worms
diseases.signs: Worms in stool, bloated belly, weight loss.
diseases.first_aid: Deworm every 2–3 months with Caniverm or Drontal Cat.
diseases.prevention: Consult a vet for correct dosage.

vaxiliv_reminder.title: Vaxiliv Reminder
vaxiliv_reminder.content: Healthy feeding, clean housing, and regular vet checkups prevent most illnesses. When something feels off — don’t guess, call your veterinarian first.

sw.tips_subtitle: Chagua mnyama kwa maelezo ya kina ya matunzo.
sw.reminders_status_denied: Arifa zimezimwa. Tafadhali washa kwenye mipangilio ya kivinjari.
sw.schedules_general_subtitle: Mwongozo wa jumla wa chanjo na minyoo. Wasiliana na daktari wa mifugo kila wakati.
sw.locator_subtitle: Pata huduma za mifugo karibu nawe.
sw.amr_intro: Ukinzani dhidi ya dawa (AMR) inamaanisha dawa zinazotumika kutibu magonjwa — kama antibiotiki — haifanyi kazi tena ipasavyo. Nchini Kenya na Afrika nzima, hii ni tishio kubwa kwa maisha ya wanyama na binadamu. Antibiotiki zikitumiwa kupita kiasi au vibaya, vimelea hujifunza na kustahimili.
sw.amr_farm_how_list:
• Kuwapa wanyama antibiotiki wasizohitaji “ili tu kuzuia magonjwa.”
  • Kununua dawa kutoka kwa maduka ya agro-vet bila maagizo ya daktari.
  • Kutumia nusu dozi au kuacha dawa katikati mnyama anapoonekana kupata nafuu.
  • Kutumia dawa za binadamu kama amoxicillin au metronidazole kwa wanyama.
  • Kupuuzia muda wa kungoja kabla ya kuuza maziwa au nyama.
sw.amr_farm_signs_list:
• Mastitisi ya mara kwa mara kwa ng'ombe ambayo haiponi.
  • Nimonia au kuhara kwa mbuzi kunakojirudia.
  • Nguruwe na kuku kufa hata baada ya kubadilisha antibiotiki kadhaa.
sw.amr_farm_what_to_do_list:
• Piga simu daktari amchunguze mnyama kabla ya matibabu.
  • Tumia tu antibiotiki za mifugo ulizoandikiwa.
  • Andika kila matibabu (jina la dawa, mnyama, dozi, na tarehe).
  • Dumisha usafi, toa dawa za minyoo, na chanjo — kinga ni bora.
  • Heshimu muda wa kungoja ili kuweka vyakula salama.
sw.amr_pets_title: Kwa Wanyama Posa: Mbwa na Paka
sw.amr_pets_mistakes_list:
• Kuwapa wanyama dawa za binadamu zilizobaki.
  • Kutumia tena maagizo ya zamani ya daktari kwa magonjwa mapya.
  • Kutibu shida ndogo za ngozi na antibiotiki badala ya kuoga na kusafisha.
sw.amr_pets_practices_list:
• Mtunze mnyama mara kwa mara kwa kutumia shampuu za kienyeji.
  • Tafuta ushauri wa daktari kila wakati kabla ya kumpa dawa yoyote.
  • Hakikisha chanjo na dawa za minyoo ziko sasisho.
sw.amr_one_health_p1: Mfumo wa Afya Moja unatambua kuwa afya ya binadamu, wanyama, na mazingira ni kitu kimoja. Wakulima wanapotumia antibiotiki vibaya, mabaki huingia kwenye udongo na maji. Bakteria wale wale wanaweza kuwafikia wanadamu kupitia maziwa, nyama, mayai, au maji.
sw.amr_one_health_p2: Mwishowe, vimelea sugu vilivyoanzia kwa mifugo vinaweza kuwaambukiza watu, na dawa tunazotegemea zinaacha kufanya kazi kwa kila mtu. Ndiyo maana madaktari wa mifugo, madaktari wa binadamu, maafisa wa mazingira, na wakulima lazima washirikiane.
sw.amr_vaxiliv_message_content: “Wanyama wenye afya, watu wenye afya, sayari yenye afya — hiyo ndiyo Afya Moja.”
about_content: Vaxiliv ilizaliwa kutokana na ukweli rahisi lakini muhimu — kwamba upatikanaji wa chanjo na huduma za afya za mifugo haupaswi kutegemea mahali unapoishi.

Tulijenga jukwaa hili kuziba pengo kati ya wafugaji wa vijijini na msaada wa mifugo wanaostahili. Kama mtu ambaye ametembea njia za vumbi za kaunti za kaskazini mwa Kenya, nimeona jinsi magonjwa yanavyoweza kuangamiza mifugo yote — si kwa ukosefu wa huduma, bali kwa ukosefu wa ufikiaji. Vaxiliv ni jibu kwa ukweli huo. Ni zaidi ya nafasi ya kidijitali; ni harakati kuelekea afya bora na iliyounganishwa ya mifugo.
Dira yetu ni kufanya ufuatiliaji wa chanjo, utoaji taarifa, na uhamasishaji kuwa rahisi — kwa kutumia teknolojia ambayo ni rahisi kwa kila mkulima, lakini yenye nguvu kwa wataalamu wa mifugo.
Kila mstari wa msimbo hapa unaongozwa na huruma, sayansi, na imani kwamba uvumbuzi unaweza kulinda maisha.
Kwa sababu tunapolinda wanyama, tunalinda familia, mifumo ya chakula, na mustakabali wetu.
Vaxiliv si kampuni; ni wito.
Ni mchango wetu kwa siku zijazo ambapo hakuna mkulima atakayeachwa nyuma, na maisha ya kila mnyama ni muhimu.

cow.title: Utunzaji na Afya ya Ng'ombe
cow.feeding_management: Ng'ombe mwenye afya huanza na ulishaji sahihi. Ng'ombe wa kilo 400 anahitaji kilo 12 za chakula kikavu kila siku. Changanya majani ya napier, lucerne, desmodium, na dairy meal. Mpe lita 40-60 za maji safi na chumvi ya madini. Weka banda safi na puliza dawa ya kupe kila wiki.

diseases.name: Homa ya Pwani (ECF)
diseases.signs: Homa kali, kuvimba kwa tezi, kupumua kwa shida, macho kutoa maji, kukosa hamu ya kula.
diseases.first_aid: Mpeleke kivulini, mpe maji safi, na piga simu daktari haraka kwa ajili ya Butalex.
diseases.prevention: Udhibiti wa kupe mara kwa mara na chanjo.

diseases.name: Ugonjwa wa Miguu na Midomo (FMD)
diseases.signs: Kudondosha mate, malengelenge mdomoni, kwenye viwele na miguuni, kukataa kutembea.
diseases.first_aid: Mtenganishe, safisha maeneo ya kulishia, mpe chakula laini.

diseases.name: Anaplasmosis
diseases.signs: Udhaifu wa ghafla, macho kuwa ya manjano, homa, mkojo wa rangi ya kahawia.
diseases.first_aid: Mweke mtulivu, kivulini, mpe maji. Wasiliana na daktari mara moja.

sheep_goat.title: Utunzaji wa Kondoo na Mbuzi
sheep_goat.feeding_management: Mbuzi hula vichaka kama Leucaena; kondoo wanapendelea nyasi za Boma Rhodes. Ongeza pumba za mahindi au mashudu ya pamba kwa ukuaji. Wape chumvi ya madini na maji safi. Mabanda yawe makavu na yaliyoinuliwa. Wape dawa ya minyoo kila baada ya miezi 2-3.

diseases.name: Mkong'oto wa Mbuzi na Kondoo (PPR)
diseases.signs: Homa kali, mafua, vidonda mdomoni, kukohoa, kuhara.
diseases.first_aid: Mtenganishe, mpe maji ya kunywa, chakula laini, na mweke mahali pa joto.

diseases.name: Homa ya Mapafu ya Mbuzi (CCPP)
diseases.signs: Kukohoa, kupumua kwa shida, mafua puani.
diseases.first_aid: Mweke kivulini na mtulize. Tiba ya daktari: tylosin.

diseases.name: Ugonjwa wa Minyoo
diseases.signs: Kupungua uzito, manyoya kuwa machafu, ufizi mweupe, uvimbe chini ya taya.
diseases.first_aid: Wape dawa ya minyoo kila miezi 2-3 kama Alfabas, Levacide, n.k.
diseases.prevention: Hakikisha malisho na maji ni safi.

pig.title: Utunzaji na Afya ya Nguruwe
pig.feeding_management: Lisha nguruwe 5-7% ya uzito wao kila siku: pumba za mahindi + unga wa samaki + unga wa soya. Wape lita 10-15 za maji safi. Weka mabanda makavu, ya joto, na safisha kwa dawa kila wiki. Wape dawa ya minyoo kila robo mwaka.

diseases.name: Homa ya Nguruwe ya Afrika (ASF)
diseases.signs: Kifo cha ghafla, homa kali, masikio mekundu, kutapika, kuhara damu.
diseases.first_aid: Hakuna tiba — mtenganishe mara moja na piga simu kwa mamlaka ya mifugo.
diseases.prevention: Usalama mkali wa kibayolojia; usilishe mabaki ya chakula.

diseases.name: Ugonjwa wa Minyoo
diseases.signs: Ukuaji duni, ngozi mbaya, tumbo kubwa, kuhara.
diseases.first_aid: Mpe dawa ya minyoo kama Albendazole au Levamisole.

dog.title: Utunzaji na Afya ya Mbwa
dog.feeding_management: Mlishe mara mbili kwa siku: wali uliopikwa, ugali, au chakula cha mbwa na nyama na mboga. Mpe maji safi kila siku. Muogeshe mara mbili kwa mwezi, chana manyoya kila wiki, na mpe dawa ya minyoo kila baada ya miezi 3.

diseases.name: Homa ya Kupe
diseases.signs: Homa ya kudumu, kukosa hamu ya kula, ufizi mweupe, kutoka damu puani.
diseases.first_aid: Mpe maji ya kutosha, mweke mahali pa baridi na mtulivu.
diseases.prevention: Daktari atampa doxycycline. Tumia dawa za kuoga za kupe na kola.

diseases.name: Parvovirus
diseases.signs: Kutapika sana, kuhara damu kunukayo vibaya, upungufu wa maji mwilini.
diseases.first_aid: Mweke joto, mpe maji, na muone daktari haraka.
diseases.prevention: Chanjo watoto wa mbwa kuanzia wiki 6-8.

diseases.name: Kichaa cha Mbwa
diseases.signs: Mabadiliko ya ghafla ya tabia, kudondosha mate, ukali, kupooza.
diseases.first_aid: Usimkaribie — mtenganishe na mjulishe daktari.

cat.title: Utunzaji na Afya ya Paka
cat.feeding_management: Mlishe paka mara mbili kwa siku na samaki au nyama iliyochanganywa na ugali au wali. Mpe maji safi ya kunywa. Chana manyoya kila wiki na weka sanduku la mchanga safi.

diseases.name: Mafua ya Paka
diseases.signs: Kupiga chafya, mafua, macho kutoa maji, kukosa hamu ya kula.
diseases.first_aid: Futa pua na macho kwa maji ya chumvi, mpe chakula laini, mweke joto.
diseases.prevention: Chanjo ya kila mwaka ya FVRCP.

diseases.name: Feline Panleukopenia
diseases.signs: Kutapika, kuhara damu, homa kali, upungufu wa maji, kifo cha ghafla.
diseases.first_aid: Mweke joto, mpe maji, na tafuta msaada wa daktari haraka.

diseases.name: Minyoo ya Paka
diseases.signs: Minyoo kwenye kinyesi, tumbo kuvimba, kupungua uzito.
diseases.first_aid: Mpe dawa ya minyoo kila miezi 2-3 kama Caniverm au Drontal Cat.
diseases.prevention: Wasiliana na daktari kwa dozi sahihi.

vaxiliv_reminder.title: Ukumbusho wa Vaxiliv
vaxiliv_reminder.content: Ulishaji bora, mabanda safi, na uchunguzi wa daktari wa mara kwa mara huzuia magonjwa mengi. Unapoona kitu si sawa — usikisie, piga simu daktari wako kwanza.

so.tips_subtitle: Dooro xayawaan si aad u hesho macluumaad faahfaahsan oo daryeel ah.
so.reminders_status_denied: Ogeysiisyada waa la diiday. Fadlan ka fur goobaha biraawsarka.
so.reminders_no_upcoming: Ma jiraan tallaalo soo socda ama kuwa dib u dhacay.
so.schedules_general_subtitle: Tilmaamaha guud ee tallaalka iyo daaweynta gooryaanka. Had iyo jeer la tasho dhakhtar xoolaad.
so.locator_subtitle: Ka hel adeegyada caafimaadka xoolaha meel kuu dhow.
so.amr_quote: “Marka daawooyinku shaqayn waayaan — dhammaanteen waan khasaarnaa.”
so.amr_intro: Iska-caabbinta Daawooyinka (AMR) waxay ka dhigan tahay in daawooyinka loo isticmaalo in lagu daweeyo caabuqyada — sida antibiyootiga — aysan si wax ku ool ah u shaqaynayn. Kenya iyo guud ahaan Afrika, tani waa khatar weyn oo ku wajahan nolosha xoolaha iyo tan aadanaha. Marka antibiyootiga si xad dhaaf ah loo isticmaalo ama si qaldan loo isticmaalo, jeermisku wuu la qabsadaa oo wuxuu bartaa sida loo badbaado.
so.amr_farm_how_list:
• In xoolaha la siiyo antibiyootig aysan u baahnayn “si looga hortago cudur.”
  • Iibsashada daawooyinka dukaamada agro-vet-ka iyada oo aan warqad dhakhtar loo haysan.
  • Isticmaalka qiyaaso nus ah ama la joojiyo daawada badhtanka marka xooluhu fiicnaadaan.
  • Isticmaalka daawooyinka dadka sida amoxicillin, metronidazole, ama ampicillin ee xoolaha.
  • Iska indhatirka muddada ka-noqoshada ka hor inta aan la iibin caanaha ama hilibka.
so.amr_farm_signs_list:
• Candhada oo ku soo noqnoqota lo'da oo aan ka jawaabin daaweynta.
  • Oof-wareenka ama shubanka riyaha oo soo noqnoqda.
  • Doofaarka iyo digaagga oo dhimanaya xitaa ka dib marka la beddelo dhowr antibiyootig.
so.amr_farm_what_to_do_list:
• Wac dhakhtar xoolaad si uu u baaro xoolaha ka hor daaweynta.
  • Isticmaal kaliya antibiyootiga xoolaha ee laguu qoray.
  • Diiwaangeli daaweyn kasta (magaca daawada, xoolaha, qiyaasta, iyo taariikhda).
  • Ilaali nadaafadda, si joogto ah u gooryaan-dil, oo tallaal — ka-hortaggu waa muhiim.
  • Ixtiraam muddada ka-noqoshada si cuntadu u ahaato mid badqabta.
so.amr_pets_mistakes_list:
• La wadaagidda daawooyinka dadka ee hadhay xayawaankaaga.
  • Dib u isticmaalka warqadihii hore ee dhakhtarka xoolaha ee cudurro cusub.
  • Ku daawaynta dhibaatooyinka maqaarka ee yar yar antibiyootig halkii aad ka maydhi lahayd oo aad nadiifin lahayd.
so.amr_pets_practices_list:
• Si joogto ah u qurxi adigoo isticmaalaya shaambooyinka deegaanka.
  • Had iyo jeer raadso fikirka dhakhtarka xoolaha ka hor intaadan siin wax daawo ah.
  • Ku hay tallaalka iyo gooryaan-dilka mid casri ah.
so.amr_one_health_p1: Habka Hal Caafimaad wuxuu aqoonsan yahay in caafimaadka dadka, xoolaha, iyo deegaanku ay isku mid yihiin. Marka beeralaydu si qaldan u isticmaalaan antibiyootiga, hadhaagu wuxuu u daataa ciidda iyo biyaha. Bakteeriyadaas isku midka ah waxay gaari kartaa dadka iyada oo loo marayo caanaha, hilibka, ukunta, biyaha, ama qashinka beeraha.
so.amr_one_health_p2: Ugu dambeyntii, jeermisyada iska-caabinta leh ee ka bilaabmay xoolaha waxay ku dhici karaan dadka, daawooyinka aan ku tiirsanahayna way joojiyaan inay u shaqeeyaan qof walba. Taasi waa sababta ay dhakhaatiirta xoolaha, dhakhaatiirta dadka, saraakiisha deegaanka, iyo beeralaydu ay tahay inay wada shaqeeyaan.
so.amr_vaxiliv_message_content: “Xayawaan caafimaad qaba, dad caafimaad qaba, meere caafimaad qaba — taasi waa Hal Caafimaad.”
about_content: Vaxiliv waxa ay ka dhalatay run fudud laakiin degdeg ah — in helitaanka tallaalka xoolaha iyo adeegyada caafimaadka xooluhu aysan ku xirnaan meesha aad ku nooshahay.

Waxaan dhisnay madalkan si aan u buuxino farqiga u dhexeeya xoolo-dhaqatada reer miyiga ah iyo taageerada caafimaadka xoolaha ee ay u qalmaan. Anigoo ah qof ku soo dhex lugeeyay waddooyinka boodhka leh ee gobollada waqooyi ee Kenya, waxaan arkay sida cudurku u tirtiri karo adhyo dhan — maaha daryeel la'aan, laakiin waa helitaan la'aan. Vaxiliv waxay u taagan tahay jawaabta xaqiiqadaas. Maaha kaliya meel dhijitaal ah; waa dhaqdhaqaaq loo wado caafimaad xoolaad oo caqli badan oo isku xiran.

Aragtidayadu waa inaan ka dhigno la socodka tallaalka, warbixinta, iyo wacyigelinta mid fudud — iyadoo la isticmaalayo tiknoolajiyad ku filan beeralay kasta, haddana awood ku filan xirfadlayaasha caafimaadka xoolaha.
Koodh kasta oo halkan ku yaal waxaa hagaya naxariis, saynis, iyo aaminaad ah in hal-abuurku ilaalin karo nolosha.
Sababtoo ah marka aan ilaalino xoolaha, waxaan ilaalinaa qoysaska, nidaamyada cuntada, iyo mustaqbalka.
Vaxiliv maaha shirkad; waa yeedhmo.
Waa ka qayb qaadashadayada mustaqbal aan beeralayna looga tagin, nolosha xoolo kastana ay muhiim tahay.

cow.title: Daryeelka & Caafimaadka Lo'da
cow.feeding_management: Lo'da caafimaadka qabta waxay ka bilaabataa quudin habboon. Sac 400 kg ah wuxuu u baahan yahay 12 kg oo walax qalalan maalin kasta. Isku qas cawska Napier, lucerne, desmodium, iyo daqiiqda caanaha. Sii 40-60 L oo biyo nadiif ah iyo macdanta. Guryaha ka dhig kuwo nadiif ah oo toddobaad kasta ku buufi shilinta.

diseases.name: Qandhada Xeebta Bari (ECF)
diseases.signs: Qandho sare, qanjidhada oo barara, neefsashada oo ku adkaata, indhaha oo ilmeeya, cunto xumo.
diseases.first_aid: U rari hoos, sii biyo nadiif ah, oo si degdeg ah u wac dhakhtar si aad u hesho Butalex.
diseases.prevention: Xakameynta shilinta joogtada ah iyo tallaalka.

diseases.name: Cudurka Cagaha iyo Afka (FMD)
diseases.signs: Candhuuf badan, nabarro afka, naasaha, iyo cagaha ka soo baxa, diidmada socodka.
diseases.first_aid: Go'doomi, jeermi-dil meelaha lagu quudiyo, sii cunto jilicsan.

diseases.name: Anaplasmosis
diseases.signs: Tabar-darro degdeg ah, indhaha oo jaale noqda, qandho, kaadi madow-brown ah.
diseases.first_aid: Xayawaanka deji, hoos geli, sii biyo. Si degdeg ah ula xiriir dhakhtar.

sheep_goat.title: Daryeelka Idaha & Riyaha
sheep_goat.feeding_management: Riyuhu waxay daaqaan geedaha sida Leucaena; iduhu waxay doorbidaan cawska Boma Rhodes. Ku dar buunshaha galleyda ama keega cudbiga si ay u koraan. Sii cusbo iyo biyo nadiif ah. Guryuhu waa inay ahaadaan kuwo qalalan oo kor loo qaaday. Gooryaan-dil 2-3 bilood kasta.

diseases.name: Peste des Petits Ruminants (PPR)
diseases.signs: Qandho sare, san-dheecaan, nabarro afka, qufac, shuban.
diseases.first_aid: Go'doomi, sii fuuq-celin afka ah, cunto jilicsan, diirran.

diseases.name: Oof-wareenka Riyaha ee la is qaadsiiyo (CCPP)
diseases.signs: Qufac, neefsashada oo ku adkaata, san-dheecaan.
diseases.first_aid: Hoos geli oo deji riyaha. Daaweynta dhakhtarka: tylosin.

diseases.name: Caabuqa Gooryaanka
diseases.signs: Miisaanka oo yaraada, dhogor qallafsan, cirid cirro leh, daanka oo barara.
diseases.first_aid: Gooryaan-dil 2-3 bilood kasta adigoo isticmaalaya Alfabas, Levacide, iwm.
diseases.prevention: Hubi daaq nadiif ah iyo biyo.

pig.title: Daryeelka & Caafimaadka Doofaarka
pig.feeding_management: Quudi doofaarka 5-7% miisaankooda maalin kasta: buunshaha galleyda + cuntada kalluunka + cuntada soyada. Sii 10-15 L oo biyo nadiif ah. Guryaha ka dhig kuwo qalalan, diirran, oo toddobaad kasta jeermi-dil. Gooryaan-dil saddexdii biloodba mar.

diseases.name: Qandhada Doofaarka Afrika (ASF)
diseases.signs: Dhimasho degdeg ah, qandho sare, dhego guduudan, matag, shuban dhiig leh.
diseases.first_aid: Daawo ma leh — isla markiiba go'doomi oo wac mas'uuliyiinta caafimaadka xoolaha.
diseases.prevention: Badqabka noole ee adag; waligaa ha quudin hadhaaga cuntada.

diseases.name: Caabuqa Gooryaanka
diseases.signs: Koris liita, maqaar qallafsan, calool weyn, shuban.
diseases.first_aid: Ku gooryaan-dil Albendazole ama Levamisole.

dog.title: Daryeelka & Caafimaadka Eyda
dog.feeding_management: Quudi laba jeer maalintii: bariis la kariyey, soor, ama cunto ey oo hilib iyo khudaar leh. Sii biyo nadiif ah maalin kasta. Maydh laba jeer bishii, caday dhogorta toddobaad kasta, oo gooryaan-dil 3 bilood kasta.

diseases.name: Qandhada Shilinta
diseases.signs: Qandho joogto ah, cunto xumo, cirid cirro leh, san-dhiig.
diseases.first_aid: Fuuqan, qabooji, oo deji.
diseases.prevention: Dhakhtarku wuxuu qori doonaa doxycycline. Isticmaal qubeyska shilinta iyo katiinadaha.

diseases.name: Parvovirus
diseases.signs: Matag daran, shuban dhiig leh oo ur xun, fuuqbax.
diseases.first_aid: Diirran, sii fuuq-celin afka ah, si degdeg ah u arag dhakhtar.

diseases.name: Rabies
diseases.signs: Isbeddel dabeecadeed oo degdeg ah, candhuuf badan, gardarro, curyaan.
diseases.first_aid: Ha taaban — go'doomi oo ogeysii dhakhtar.

cat.title: Daryeelka & Caafimaadka Bisadaha
cat.feeding_management: Quudi bisadaha laba jeer maalintii kalluun ama hilib lagu qasay soor ama bariis. Sii biyo nadiif ah. Caday dhogorta toddobaad kasta oo nadiifi sanduuqa qashinka.

diseases.name: Hargabka Bisadaha
diseases.signs: Hindhiso, san-dheecaan, indho ilmeeya, cunto xumo.
diseases.first_aid: Sanka & indhaha ku masax milix, sii cunto jilicsan, diirran.

diseases.name: Feline Panleukopenia
diseases.signs: Matag, shuban dhiig leh, qandho sare, fuuqbax, dhimasho degdeg ah.
diseases.first_aid: Diirran, sii dareere, si degdeg ah u raadso caawimaad dhakhtar.

diseases.name: Gooryaanka Bisadaha
diseases.signs: Gooryaan saxarada ku jira, calool bararsan, miisaanka oo yaraada.
diseases.first_aid: Gooryaan-dil 2-3 bilood kasta adigoo isticmaalaya Caniverm ama Drontal Cat.
diseases.prevention: La tasho dhakhtar si aad u hesho qiyaasta saxda ah.

vaxiliv_reminder.title: Xusuusin Vaxiliv
vaxiliv_reminder.content: Quudinta caafimaadka leh, guryaha nadiifka ah, iyo baaritaannada joogtada ah ee dhakhtarku waxay ka hortagaan cudurrada badankood. Marka wax qaldan dareento — ha malayn, marka hore wac dhakhtarkaaga xoolaha.
